name: Visible Thoughts: 009
description:
009 of the Visible Thoughts series.

The symbiosis between music and writing is obvious to anyone who experiences them. I love listening to instrumental music while writing. Like the soundtrack to my own internal movie, the music dictates the flow of my words and helps me imagine scenes in ways that I couldn't without it. Even now, I'm listening to music. It helps me write these descriptions when I feel I have nothing to say. I turn on the music and realize there's actually quite a lot still rattling around in my head.
